text: Ubaldo Aquino Valenzano (born May 2, 1958) is a retired football (soccer) referee from Paraguay,http://usa.worldfootball.net/schiedsrichter_profil/ubaldo- aquino/#redirect best known for supervising two matches (Germany-Saudi ArabiaFIFA. "Match Report - Germany - Saudi Arabia 8:0 (4:0)". 1 June 2002. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. and Sweden-Senegal)FIFA. "Match Report - Sweden - Senegal 1:2 a.e.t. (1:1, 1:1)". 16 June 2002. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. during the 2002 FIFA World Cup in South Korea and Japan.http://usa.worldfootball.net/schiedsrichter_profil/ubaldo-aquino/1/1/ Aquino is known to have served as a FIFA referee during the period from 1995Gerrard, Russell. "International Matches 1995 - Intercontinental, April- June". RSSSF, 2 February 2005. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. to 2003.FIFA. "Match Report - Argentina - Chile 2:2 (2:0)". 6 September 2003. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. He officiated in numerous international competitions, including the 1999 FIFA Confederations Cup,FIFA. "Match Report - Egypt - Saudi Arabia 1:5 (0:2)". 29 July 1999. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. 1997 FIFA World Youth Championship,FIFA. "Match Report - Morocco - Belgium 1:1 (0:0)". 19 June 1997. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. and qualifying matches for the 1998,FIFA. "Match Report - USA - Mexico 2:2 (1:1)". 20 April 1997. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. 2002,FIFA. "Match Report - Venezuela - Brazil 0:6 (0:5)". 8 October 2000. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. and 2006 World Cups. Aquino also served as a referee in the 1999Tabeira, Martín. "Copa América 1999". RSSSF, 31 May 2012. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. and 2001 Copa América competitions, officiating the final in 2001.Tabeira, Martín. "Copa América 2001". RSSSF, 31 May 2012. Retrieved on 29 April 2013. After retiring from his career as a match official, Aquino has worked as referee coordinator for the Asociación Paraguaya de Fútbol.FIFA. "Association Information: Paraguay". Retrieved on 29 April 2013. ==Notes== Category:1958 births Category:Paraguayan football referees Category:FIFA World Cup referees Category:Living people Category:Copa América referees Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:2002 FIFA World Cup referees
title: Ubaldo Aquino
